description: Configures an event selector or advanced event selectors for your trail.
mitreAttackSubTechniques: T1562.001: Impair Defenses: Disable or Modify Tools

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: By configuring event selectors, adversaries can exclude certain activities from being logged, effectively removing traces of their presence and actions, which hinders detection and forensic analysis.

By customizing event selectors, adversaries can avoid logging specific activities that involve the use of obfuscated files or information, thereby evading detection mechanisms that rely on log analysis.

incidents.description: New tactics and techniques for proactive threat detection

researchLinks.description: Detecting and removing risky actions out of your IAM security policies

securityImplications: Attackers might use PutEventSelectors to disrupting AWS logging.
